TopicTitle: KSP freezes when I edit my staging.

Articles.Content: I get 120 fps constant in the game but for some odd reason when I mouse over anything in my staging the game will freeze for about 1-2 seconds, this makes building rockets the hardest part of the game. Sorry if this has been answered before, I searched google and this forum and didn't find anything.

Hi cowswag

Help us help you by checking out the thread here, this issue doesn't sound familiar so we'll need more info.
